duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager with achieving retail store targets by driving sales.
Open and close the store in the absence of other management, and ensure the store trades safely and legally.
Deliver sales through friendly and efficient customer service, ensuring customers have a fun and enjoyable shopping experience.
Assist with store deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, and promotions.
Assist with ear piercing after receiving full training.
Ensure the store looks presentable and inviting to customers.
